mdx.excerpt: What is ES6? ES6 stands for ECMAScript 6. ECMAScript was created to standardize JavaScript, and ES6 is the 6th version of ECMAScript, it was published in 201â€¦

With an arrow function, this represents the Header object no matter who called the function:
